short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds direct links to show full resolution images on instagram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds direct links to show full resolution images on instagram. Install this extension, go to intagram page that you want to view full res images on, click on the extension button on right side of the address bar and you should see new buttons on top left side of all loaded images.  Please see the screenshot for details.
